oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1955-07-09 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from July 9, 1955. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Cowboy Copas (host/performer), guest performer Hank Locklin, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Tommy Jackson, Moon Mullican, Minnie Pearl, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Moon Mullican; Minnie Pearl; Hank Locklin; Chet Atkins; Cowboy Copas
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Cherokee Boogie (Moon Mullican) [continued from part 1] -- Cowboy Copas introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- How To Catch A Man (Minnie Pearl) -- Cowboy Copas introduces Hank Locklin -- You're Out Of Step (With The Beat Of My Heart) (Hank Locklin) -- Cowboy Copas introduces Chet Atkins -- Tennessee Polka (Chet Atkins) -- Cowboy Copas talks -- Filipino Baby (Cowboy Copas) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Cowboy Copas) -- Cavalier Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Copas, Cowboy; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Jackson, Tommy; Newton, Ernie; Mullican, Moon, 1909-1967; Locklin, Hank
